Skills

React

Sass

Used in other applications

Redux

  • No authentication or global state needed, so opted to just use useState for each individual page instead

JWT Auth

  • No authentication needed for app, but have experience using JWT for authentication

Bootstrap

  • Have used Bootstrap in the past but unless I'm creating a simple UI for complext backend, I opt to create Bootstrap like functionality using Sass and React

EJS

  • I've used EJS extensively in the past but now opt to use React

JQuery

  • Indirectly using Javascript through react, but have in the past built out event listeners and interacted with the DOM directly using Javascript

JavaScript

  • Indirectly using Javascript through react, but have in the past built out event listeners and interacted with the DOM directly using Javascript

MySQL/SQL

  • Opted for NoSQL (MongoDB specifically) for scalability in future projects, but have extensive experience building and querying SQL tables from profession as a Corporate Finance Professional

Evolution

Iteration Progress

  • Iteration 1

    Front end only-- static HTML, Bootstrap, with some functionality through Javascript/JQuery

  • Iteration 2

    Backend using Node and Exress with front end similar to first iteration, but rendered by an EJS engine

  • Iteration 3

    MERN stack with a theme building exercise using plain HTML and Sass
